short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find cryptocurrencies information, create a Watch List, monitor prices, & calculate Gains/Loss.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browsing in the traditional web engine, you may find yourself looking through many websites to find cryptocurrency's information such as market cap, circulating supplies, trading volume, or finding the smart contract's address to import into digital wallets like MetaMask or to swap one currency to another in PancakeSwap and UniSwap.

This extension is an alternative solution to quickly find official information. Including direct links to the homepage, social media contents (twitter, discord, reddit), announcement page (medium), transaction history (etherscan, bscscan, blockchair), and the development source code (github).

CoinSausage can be use as a research tool to find new projects, checking for projects' network mainnet, contract address, market condition, current price, historical charts, development, community, liquidity, and trust score ratings. To make this extension more useful, you can track favorite projects by adding them to a Watch List and calculate potential Gains/Loss by entering a purchase price and unit amounts to get the total portfolio value based on the current market price.

_________________ How To Use_________________

1. Search bar on the upper left can be typed in to find projects by Name or Symbol.

2. Contract Address can be copy and paste.

3. To create a Watch List, press "Add to watch list" to add. All items from the list are clickable to view. These added items will automatically be generated in the "Watch List Portfolio Calculator" where you can enter purchase price and unit amounts to calculate/auto-update the Gains/Loss total values.

4. When a cryptocurrency is selected "Load Price Charts & Supplies" and "Load Rating Scores & Sources URL" on the bottom of the extension can be used to load the data that is needed.

5. The button "Search & Filter By Categories" can be used to discover other Defi projects that are categorized by Analytic, Education, Play-To-Earn, NFTs, and many more. Each category will generate a list of projects sorted by highest to lowest market cap. When a coin is selected from the list, 24H data will appear, and using buttons from #4 can load other data like price charts or official sources. 

6. The button "Top 100 Cryptocurrencies" will generate a list of the top 100 and can be sorting by Highest/Lowest Market Cap or Highest/Lowest Volume. When a coin is selected from the list, using buttons from #4 can also load those data.

7. Price of cryptocurrency can be converted up to 48 different countries' fiat currencies. (USD, EUR, CAD, AUS, IDR, TWD, KRW, JPY, CNY, PHP, VND, etc.)

8. A notepad to use for recording dates, reminders, or special events.

***Notes: There is a 50 calls limit per minute meaning every time data is generated will be considered as one call. If the extension is not loading, to fix this. Simply close the extension and relaunch later.

To learn more, visit:

www.coinsausage.io/how-to-guide

__________________ Privacy ___________________

This extension do not track your browsing history or store any data.

_________________ Reminder __________________

Our data is provided by CoinGecko, which is being monitored by their team to provide reliable sources. They reserve the rights to list and unlisted any cryptoassets that they find is inaccurate.

__________________ Updates ___________________

1.0.1 - 1.3.0
- Many functionalities and features have been added and improved to help the user easily navigate while using the extension. 
- Fixed the decimals format for smaller prices.
- Added the Top 100 Cryptocurrencies feature.
- 48 different countries fiat currency is now available to convert the current price of cryptocurrencies.
- An improved implementation of Public Notice and Additional Notices are much easier to recognize as an exclamation mark will appear next to the Trust Score Rating.
- Total Portfolio Value is added to Watch List Portfolio Calculator to calculate all inputs of Gains/Loss.
- Create a Watch List and calculate potential investments.
- Trust Score ratings to show low or high liquidity.
- Fixed bugs in the search box and price charts for better results. 

Thank you for considering using our extension. If you enjoy using CoinSausage, please help us improve by rating and sharing your thought in our Chrome Web Store Listing. We will keep improving and occasionally update for a better user experience.
